name: Trello: Board background color
description: Change background color to teal (or your own color by changing the css color code).
additional_info: To set your own color, you need to edit the css color in the source code of the style. Using a color picker or graphical program, choose the desired color, and find the color code - for example #8bac52 for olive green. Then open the style (in Firefox, Menu dropdown > Stylish > Manage styles, choose the installed style, click Edit). Replace the color value with your own.
